title: Machine Learning-based Slope Stability Assessment Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering mathematics and geology concepts, along with foundational programming knowledge
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation training to learn slope stability assessment methods, emphasizing personal device utilization and team project execution capabilities

learning_goals: Explain the concept and importance of Factor of Safety (FOS) in slope stability assessment
Understand the basic principles of PCA (Principal Component Analysis) and BPNN (Backpropagation Neural Network) and apply them to data preprocessing
Build machine learning models to calculate FOS based on real terrain data using VR simulation tools
Perform virtual slope stability assessment scenarios using trained models and interpret results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
